name: Chat Area
description: Displays all the conversation history of the currently selected channel or direct message. Includes messages, threads, and media shared.
location: Central section of the interface, displaying the active channel or conversation.

sub.name: Message Display Area
sub.description: The main section where messages sent within a channel or direct message are displayed, including text and media.
sub.location: Centrally located within the Chat Area parent component.

sub.name: Thread Viewer
sub.description: Interface for viewing and interacting with threads linked to specific messages.
sub.location: Pops out as a sidebar or overlay when a thread is accessed.
user_interactions: Opens thread view on message click.

sub.name: Message Content Section
sub.description: The section within the Message Display Area where individual message content is displayed including text, images, and files.
sub.location: Within the Message Display Area, appearing as user scrolls through messages.

sub.name: Thread Interaction Pane
sub.description: Detailed view where users can interact with threads, add new replies, or view existing responses.
sub.location: Accessible through the Thread Viewer as a slide-out pane.
user_interactions: Reply to thread using input box.
Like or react to thread messages.

sub.name: Message Bubble
sub.description: Encapsulated area for individual messages displayed within the Chat Area, showing text, sender, and time.
sub.location: Appears sequentially as part of the Message Content Section.

sub.name: Thread Interaction Panel
sub.description: Interface to engage specifically with message threads, allowing users to add replies or review message history.
sub.location: Activated as part of a thread interaction via the Thread Interaction Pane.
user_interactions: Add to thread on text input and send.

sub.name: Message Text Content
sub.description: Displays the text portion of each message, including styling and links.
sub.location: Inside each Message Bubble within the Message Content Section.

sub.name: Media Attachment Display
sub.description: Area within Message Bubbles showing attached images, files, or videos.
sub.location: Within the Message Bubble, alongside or below text content.

sub.name: Thread Reply Input
sub.description: Input box within the Thread Interaction Panel for adding replies to existing threads.
sub.location: At the bottom of the Thread Interaction Panel.

sub.name: Pinned Indicator Badge
sub.description: Badge icon representing pinned status on a message within the Highlight Feature for Pinned Items.
sub.location: Overlayed on the message title or corner within the Pinned Item Highlighter.
user_interactions: Click to view all pinned items.

sub.name: Reaction Pop-up Menu
sub.description: Pop-up menu that expands from the Reaction Icon Display, listing available emoji reactions.
sub.location: Adjacent to the Reaction Icon Display, overlaying message area.

sub.name: Bookmark Edit Overlay
sub.description: Overlay allowing modification or deletion of bookmarks within the Bookmark Configuration Panel.
sub.location: Part of the Bookmark Configuration Panel.

sub.name: Filter Application Tools
sub.description: Tools within the Advanced Search Toolbar assisting in filtering search results by category or date.
sub.location: Integrated into the Advanced Search Toolbar.

sub.name: Highlight Feature for Pinned Items
sub.description: Emphasizes pinned messages or items within the main chat for better visibility.
sub.location: Functional within the Pinned Item Highlighter.

sub.name: Reaction Icon Display
sub.description: Interactive element allowing users to add and view emoji reactions to messages.
sub.location: Visible when hovering over a message.

sub.name: Bookmark Configuration Panel
sub.description: Options panel allowing users to add, remove, or edit bookmarks.
sub.location: Integrated within the Bookmark Management Interface.

sub.name: Advanced Search Toolbar
sub.description: Toolbar facilitating advanced search queries and applying filters within the Search Modal Overlay.
sub.location: Part of the Search Modal Overlay interface.
user_interactions: Search by message type or user.

sub.name: Link Click Interaction
sub.description: Handles interactions when a user clicks on hyperlinks within message text.
sub.location: Embedded within each Message Text Content area.
user_interactions: Opens link in a new tab.

sub.name: Media Preview Overlay
sub.description: Provides a detailed view when users click on media attachments within a message.
sub.location: Activated from the Media Attachment Display.

sub.name: URL Preview Card
sub.description: Embedded preview that provides a snippet view of the URL content within the Message Text Content.
sub.location: Appears as part of the Message Text Content when a link is included.

sub.name: Media Viewer Modal
sub.description: Modal window offering a detailed view of media and providing tools for interaction like zooming or saving.
sub.location: Overlay element activated via the Media Preview Overlay.
user_interactions: Media enlarges or shrinks with zoom.

sub.name: Link Hover Preview
sub.description: Hover effect that provides a preview of the URL content within the Message Text Content.
sub.location: Triggers when hovering over URLs in the URL Preview Card.

sub.name: Media Interaction Tools
sub.description: Provides tools for interacting with media inside the Media Viewer Modal, including zoom and share.
sub.location: Accessible within the Media Viewer Modal.

sub.name: Reply Read Confirmation
sub.description: Notifies users that their thread reply has been read by another participant.
sub.location: Functions within the Thread Reply Indicator.

sub.name: Pin Dropdown Options
sub.description: Dropdown providing specific options to manage pinned items, appearing within the Pinning Options Dropdown.
sub.location: Located in the Pinning Options Dropdown.

sub.name: Tally Breakdown Tooltip
sub.description: Tooltip providing details on individual reaction counts when users hover over the Reaction Tally Display.
sub.location: Part of the Reaction Tally Display component.

sub.name: Bookmark Content Editor
sub.description: Editor feature that allows in-depth changes to bookmark details and organization.
sub.location: Integrated within the Bookmark Detail Editor.

sub.name: Filter Category Chips
sub.description: Chips representing active filter categories in the search, part of Active Filter Display.
sub.location: Visible within the Active Filter Display section.

sub.name: Thread Reply Indicator
sub.description: Acknowledges receipt of a reply within a thread, showing successful delivery.
sub.location: Displayed in the Reply Submission Confirmation section.

sub.name: Pinning Options Dropdown
sub.description: Dropdown for managing pinned items, allowing toggling or listing within the Pinned Item Interaction Overlay.
sub.location: Part of the Pinned Item Interaction Overlay.

sub.name: Reaction Tally Display
sub.description: Shows individual counts of each reaction type added to a message.
sub.location: Located adjacent to the Emoji Reaction Display Counter.

sub.name: Link Interaction Preview
sub.description: Interactive preview allowing users to see content snippet when hovering over a URL.
sub.location: Within the URL Preview Card of the Message Text Content.

sub.name: Interactive Media Tools
sub.description: Set of tools provided to interact with media, including zoom, rotate, or full-screen features.
sub.location: Embedded within the Media Interaction Tools area.

sub.name: Read Confirmation Notice
sub.description: Notification or visual cue indicating a reply has been read by thread participants.
sub.location: Appears near the Reply Read Confirmation within threads.
user_interactions: Alert displayed when reply is read.

sub.name: Pin Management Dropdown
sub.description: Dropdown management tool for pinned items, providing options such as pinning, unpinning or reordering.
sub.location: Located within the Pin Dropdown Options section.

sub.name: Emoji Reaction Stats
sub.description: Summary view of aggregated emoji reactions for individual messages, accessible via Reaction Tally Display.
sub.location: Associated with Reaction Tally Display, adjacent to messages.

sub.name: Bookmark Attribute Editor
sub.description: Toolset within Bookmark Content Editor enabling modification of individual bookmark attributes like title, URL, and tags.
sub.location: Available within the Bookmark Content Editor.

sub.name: Filter Chip Controls
sub.description: UI elements for controlling active search filters represented as chips, part of Filter Category Chips.
sub.location: Exists within Filter Category Chips.

sub.name: Bookmark Detail Editor
sub.description: Editor allowing users to modify bookmark details, including name and URL.
sub.location: Within the Bookmark Edit Controls.

sub.name: Active Filter Display
sub.description: Visual representation of currently active filters in search, shown in the Search Filter Chip.
sub.location: Part of the Filter Application Tools.

sub.name: Reply Submission Confirmation
sub.description: Feedback mechanism confirming message delivery after user adds a reply in the Thread Reply Input.
sub.location: Operational within the Thread Reply Input.

sub.name: Pinned Item Interaction Overlay
sub.description: Overlay facilitating interactions with pinned items, allowing unpinning or direct navigation.
sub.location: Linked to the Pinned Indicator Badge.

sub.name: Emoji Reaction Display Counter
sub.description: Counter showing the total number of reactions each message has received.
sub.location: Next to the Reaction Icon Display within the Reaction Pop-up Menu.

sub.name: Bookmark Edit Controls
sub.description: Controls for editing bookmark details within the Bookmark Edit Overlay.
sub.location: Part of the Bookmark Edit Overlay.
user_interactions: Edit fields for title or notes.

sub.name: Search Filter Chip
sub.description: Interactive elements representing active filters within the Filter Application Tools.
sub.location: Appears in the Advanced Search Toolbar.

sub.name: Pinned Item Highlighter
sub.description: Highlights pinned items for easy visibility within the Pinned Items Panel.
sub.location: Within the Pinned Items Panel, visually distinguishing highlighted items.

sub.name: Emoji Reaction Selection
sub.description: Provides tooltips and selection options for emoji reactions when hovering over messages.
sub.location: Part of the Emoji Reaction Toolbar.

sub.name: Bookmark Management Interface
sub.description: Allows users to manage bookmarks from the Bookmark Sidebar, including adding, removing, or organizing bookmarks.
sub.location: Accessed within the Bookmark Sidebar.

sub.name: URL Content Tooltip
sub.description: Tooltip showing a brief description or image of a linked URL when hovered over.
sub.location: Above or beside the link in the Message Text Content.

sub.name: Media Zoom Tool
sub.description: Tool within the Interactive Media Tools that allows users to zoom into media for a closer view.
sub.location: Within the Interactive Media Tools of the Media Viewer Modal.
user_interactions: Click or slide to zoom media.

sub.name: Read Receipt Indicator
sub.description: Icon or text showing that a participant in the thread has read the message.
sub.location: Displayed within the Read Confirmation Notice.

sub.name: Pin Action Menu
sub.description: Menu providing action buttons for managing pin status, accessible from Pin Management Dropdown.
sub.location: Located within the Pin Management Dropdown.

sub.name: Reaction Distribution Tooltip
sub.description: Shows the distribution of reactions when users hover over the Emoji Reaction Stats.
sub.location: Appears near the Reaction Stats section.

sub.name: Bookmark Field Editor
sub.description: Input fields enabling changes to bookmark properties like name or tag.
sub.location: Part of the Bookmark Attribute Editor.

sub.name: Filter Management Chips
sub.description: Chips representing active filters with management capabilities, embedded in the Filter Chip Controls.
sub.location: Within the Filter Chip Controls section.

sub.name: Search Modal Overlay
sub.description: Full screen or modal overlay facilitating detailed searches within the chat.
sub.location: Part of the Search Interface, displaying search results.

sub.name: URL Summary Card
sub.description: Card displayed when a URL is included in a message, showing a brief preview of the link content.
sub.location: Embedded within the Message Text Content area.

sub.name: Full Media Viewer
sub.description: Provides an interface for full viewing of media with options like full-screen and downloadable buttons.
sub.location: Accessible through the Interactive Media Tools section.
user_interactions: Switches media to full-screen on click.

sub.name: Reply Read Notification
sub.description: Notification that informs users when their reply has been read in threads.
sub.location: Located in the Read Confirmation Notice section.

sub.name: Pin Options Menu
sub.description: Menu to manage pinned items, offering controls like pinning or unpinning and item organization.
sub.location: Exists within the Pin Action Menu.
user_interactions: Reorder or unpin from menu list.

sub.name: Emoji Reaction Breakdown Tooltip
sub.description: Detailed breakdown tooltip providing specifics on who reacted and what emoji reaction was used.
sub.location: Related to the Reaction Distribution Tooltip.
user_interactions: Tooltip with details shows on hover.

sub.name: Bookmark Attribute Field
sub.description: Fields for editing the attributes of bookmarks, such as name or URL.
sub.location: Part of the Bookmark Field Editor.
user_interactions: Field changes are saved on confirmation.

sub.name: Search Filter Chip Management
sub.description: Management tools for handling search filter chips, facilitating operations like filter change or removal.
sub.location: Within Filter Management Chips.
user_interactions: Activate or deactivate filters via chips.

sub.name: Pinned Items Panel
sub.description: Displays messages or items that have been pinned for quick access.
sub.location: Accessed through a toggle within the Chat Area.
user_interactions: Navigates to the original message on click.

sub.name: Emoji Reaction Toolbar
sub.description: Toolbar allowing users to add emoji reactions to messages for a quick response.
sub.location: Adjacent to each message within the Chat Area.

sub.name: Bookmark Sidebar
sub.description: Sidebar showing all bookmarks created by the user for quick reference.
sub.location: Located alongside the main Chat Area on user command.

sub.name: Search Interface
sub.description: Interface to search for messages, files, or users within the Chat Area.
sub.location: Accessible from a search bar in the Chat Area.

sub.name: Snippet View Thumbnail
sub.description: Thumbnail view that gives a visual snippet of the URL content when hovered over a link.
sub.location: Part of the URL Content Tooltip within the URL Summary Card.

sub.name: Zoom Interaction Buttons
sub.description: Buttons enabling users to zoom in and out within the Full Media Viewer.
sub.location: Within the Full Media Viewer interface.

sub.name: Notification Display Element
sub.description: Element indicating read statuses across conversation replies and threads.
sub.location: Displayed in the Reply Read Notification section.

sub.name: Pin Interactions Manager
sub.description: Manager allowing users to pin or unpin messages and manage their order visually.
sub.location: Accessible within the Pin Options Menu.
user_interactions: Messages reordered by drag and drop.

sub.name: Reaction Summary Indicator
sub.description: Indicator providing a summary count of how many and what type of emoji reactions a message has received.
sub.location: Adjacent to the Emoji Reaction Breakdown Tooltip.

sub.name: Bookmark Edit Field
sub.description: Fields enabling users to add or adjust information related to their bookmarks.
sub.location: Located within the Bookmark Attribute Field.

sub.name: Filter Operation Chips
sub.description: Chips allowing active management of search filters, handling operations like activation, deactivation, or deletion.
sub.location: Related to the Search Filter Chip Management section.
